Original: I found out that I'm not able to find any locations that are offering a rental car to throw in my One hundred dollars as bank balance I have. I keep searching every single time. What is it? But there's no results
Translated:
Customer Message:
I've discovered that I'm unable to locate any rental car locations that will accept my $100 bank balance. I've been searching repeatedly, but I'm not getting any results. What's going on?

Translated Message:
Hello, I'm having some trouble finding a rental car location that accepts a $100 bank balance. I've searched multiple times, but I haven't found any results yet. Could you please help me understand what might be happening? Thank you.

Original: So I think there's something wrong here, today I wanna know if it's possible I could use my savings code somewhere else enabled, in order to rent a car that I don't find the booking website really reliable at all.
Translated:
Customer Message:
I believe there may be an issue with my savings code. I would like to confirm if it's possible to use this code at another rental location, as I find the booking website not entirely reliable.

Translated Message:
Hello! I'm reaching out because I think there might be a problem with my savings code. I was wondering if it's possible to use this code at a different rental location, as I'm having some doubts about the reliability of the booking website. Thank you!

Original: Can you further provide me the information for this car rental? Where will it be picked up and dropped off?
Translated:
Sure, I'd be happy to help! The customer is requesting more information about their car rental, specifically where the pick-up and drop-off locations are. Here's a positive and friendly response:

"Hello! I'd be delighted to give you more details about your car rental. To make things as convenient as possible for you, could you please tell me your preferred pick-up location? Once you've enjoyed your rental, you can drop it off at the same location or choose a different one if that suits you better. Let me know how I can assist you further!"

Original: Okay, if I searched Concord myself maybe I could find that and look at it manually. Okay I'm searching right now and it says we're unable to find any available vehicles in Concord. Did you put a specific date or time or something?
Translated:
Sure thing! Here's a possible translation:

"Thank you for your message. I understand that you're having trouble finding available vehicles in Concord. I appreciate your willingness to search for yourself, and I'd be happy to help you with that! I did a quick search and it looks like we don't have any vehicles available in Concord at the moment. I'm wondering if there might be a specific date or time that you're interested in? I'd be happy to check again for you if so!"

By acknowledging the customer's frustration and thanking them for their efforts, we can help to create a more positive and collaborative interaction. By offering to help with the search and providing specific steps for how we can do so, we can also help to clarify the customer's needs and make it easier for the agent to address them effectively.

Original: Wait a minute, I thought you said so none of the Concord locations are open right now?
Translated: The customer is expressing confusion about the operating hours of the Concord locations. They were under the impression that none of the Concord locations are currently open. Could you please clarify the situation for them? Thank you!

Original: Can you find out can you do some more searching to see if there's any other locations besides Hertz that have cars?
Translated: The customer is asking if it's possible for you to search for other rental car locations, besides Hertz, that have available vehicles. They would like you to look into this further. Thank you for your help!

Original: No, we're no, we're not, we're not looking for that anymore, because I made very clear that when we receive that, we realized that we got to, we got to the reservation is almost over two hou~ more than two hours ago.
Translated:
Customer Feedback: We are no longer interested in the option we previously considered, as we realized that it is too close to the end of our reservation, which is more than two hours from now.

Adjusted Tone: I appreciate you reaching out to us! We've reevaluated our initial choice and have decided that it's not suitable for our current reservation. We noticed that the option we were considering would only leave us with less than two hours to utilize it. Thank you for your understanding!

Original: And I said, well, we were supposed to get there last night and they didn't have it last night and he said, this isn't the right reservation number for Jason and maybe they made the reservation somewhere else.
Translated:
Customer feedback: "Upon arriving last night, it appears there was no reservation under the name Jason. The possibility of the reservation being made at a different location has been suggested."

Friendly and approachable tone: "Hello! It seems there might have been a mix-up with the reservation for Jason. He was expecting to find it ready for check-in last night, but it wasn't available. The agent suggested that the reservation could have been made at another location. Could you please help us look into this further and confirm the correct reservation details for Jason? Thank you!"

Original: But when I when I called the number, I called your number, I kept getting directed to a number that would say, put the right PIN code in and when I did it hung up on me.
Translated:
Customer feedback:
During my recent call to your support number, I encountered an issue where I was repeatedly asked to input the correct PIN code. Unfortunately, upon entering the PIN, the system disconnected the call. I'm looking for assistance to resolve this problem.

Revised customer message:
Hello, I had a small issue when I called your support line. I was prompted to enter a PIN code, and after doing so, the call ended abruptly. I'm reaching out to ensure we can resolve this so I can have a smooth experience in the future. Thank you!

Original: That happened to her and happened to be three times in a row. So I was never able to get from the person to talk to you.
Translated: The customer tried to reach out to us on three separate occasions, but was unable to connect with a representative each time. This issue also affected another individual. The customer is looking for a resolution to their problem and would appreciate if we could assist them directly. Thank you!
